text:
e="preserve">Steven O. Farmer (December 31, 1948 – April 7, 2020) was an American guitarist, composer and singer-songwriter. He was born in Detroit, Michigan. Farmer was best known for his works with Ted Nugent in 1968. His best known song was "Journey to the Center of the Mind". He also worked with The Amboy Dukes.
Farmer died on April 7, 2020 in Redford, Michigan, aged 71.

annotations.surface_form: Journey to the Center of the Mind
